name: Paint the walls being colorblind
description:
Paint the walls that you are in charge of the indicated color being colorblind! where is the limitation

The limitation is that by having to paint the walls and the player being colorblind, the color you choose may not be the one you thought and that is why: "You are your own enemy"

How to play:

-Move the roller with the mouse to the wall to paint

-If the roller is gray and without paint, put it inside the paint pot.

-If the paint runs out, press "choose color" and choose the color you want, but it may not be the color you wanted, although you can also ask the customer
